tool_description: This api tests a grade to your letter grade standards and give the correct response.
name: Grade calculator
title: Grade calculator

api_list.name: Grade Calculator
api_list.description: input the letter grade minimums and the grade.

required_parameters.name: d_minimum
required_parameters.description: D grade minimum(the lowest possible D grade)

required_parameters.name: c_minimum
required_parameters.description: C grade minimum (the lowest possible C grade)

required_parameters.name: a_minimum
required_parameters.description: A grade minimum (the lowest possible A grade)

required_parameters.name: b_minimum
required_parameters.description: B grade minimum (the lowest possible B grade)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://grade-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/grade/90/80/70/60/85"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grade-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://grade-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/grade/{a_minimum}/{b_minimum}/{c_minimum}/{d_minimum}/{grade}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grade-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
